subject: Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: Liko Kenney, a cousin of skier Bode Miller, had at least two confrontations in early 2003 with Bruce McKay, the local police officer he killed Friday night in a shooting that left both dead.
snippet: Liko Kenney, a cousin of skier Bode Miller, had at least two confrontations in early 2003 with Bruce McKay, the local police officer he killed Friday night in a shooting that left both dead.
